decisions.label: Does Sign Count equal Repeater Count?

rules.name: No_Count_mismatch
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2) OR (3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 6) OR (7 AND 8) OR (9 AND 10) OR (11 AND 12)
rules.label: No - Count mismatch

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Quick_Permit_Project_Header_Display
fields.fieldText: New {!Record_Type_Name} Application

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Quick_Permit_Project_Display
fields.fieldText:
Project Details

Provide us with additional details about the project by filling in the details below.

fields.name: Are_you_submitting_the_application_under_the_ordinances_and_policies_in_effect_a
fields.fieldText: Are you submitting the application under the ordinances and policies in effect at the time the application is accepted for review by the Town of Clayton?

fields.name: Please_specify_the_ordinance_s_and_or_policy_ies_including_version_s_under_which
fields.fieldText: Please specify the ordinance(s) and/or policy(ies), including version(s), under which the application is being submitted?

fields.name: Is_this_for_an_existing_project
fields.fieldText: Is this for an existing project?

fields.name: What_is_the_current_project_name
fields.fieldText: What is the current project name?

fields.name: Reference_Text_Explanation
fields.fieldText: Please use the Reference Text field in the repeaters to identify which Sign is being described. Please use the "+ Add " button under the Repeater to add information for each sign being reported.

fields.name: Sign_Count_Mismatch_Ground
fields.fieldText: There is a mismatch between the Number of adjacent lots with ground signs and the number of signs with data provided. Please create additional boxes below for each sign referenced.

fields.name: Sign_Count_Mismatch_Non_Ground
fields.fieldText: There is a mismatch between the Number of Proposed signs and the number of signs with data provided. Please create additional boxes below for each sign referenced.

fields.fieldText: This application cannot be submitted since two electronic message boards are not permitted on a lot that is less than 2 acres.

fields.name: Sign_Information_Display_Text
fields.fieldText:
Please ensure your sign placement(s) follow the following guidelines:


﻿Sign Number Limits


Awning Signs: 1 per every linear 10ft. 

MAXIMUM HEIGHT

  • Under the roof or top of a parapet wall

MAXIMUM SIGN FACE AREA PER INDIVIDUAL AWNING SIGN

  • 25 percent of the awning area upon which it is located, including the drip flap, if provided

MAXIMUM SIGN FACE AREA OF ALL AWNING SIGNS PER LOT

  • 5 percent of each façade facing a street

Banner signs: 1 per use, or non-residential tenant.

MAXIMUM MOUNTING HEIGHT

  • Below the roof or parapet

MAXIMUM SIGN FACE AREA PER INDIVIDUAL BANNER

  • 20 square feet

MAXIMUM BANNER LENGTH

  • 10 linear feet

MAXIMUM BANNER WIDTH

  • 4 linear feet

MINIMUM SETBACK

  • 10 feet from the edge of pavement or minimum necessary to avoid placement within a street right-of-way

MAXIMUM DURATION

  • One occurrence for a maximum duration of 30 consecutive days per use or tenant per calendar year

 

Electronic Message Boards: 1 per lot or development

MINIMUM SEPARATION OF EMB FROM RESIDENTIALLY-ZONED LAND

  • 150 linear feet

MINIMUM SEPARATION FROM ANOTHER EMB

  • 35 linear feet

MAXIMUM HEIGHT

  • In accordance with wall or ground sign standards, as appropriate

MAXIMUM EMB FACE AREA

  • In accordance with wall or ground sign standards, as appropriate

MAXIMUM PERCENTAGE OF TOTAL SIGN FACE AREA DEVOTED TO AN EMB

  • Lesser of: 32 square feet or 50% of the total allowable sign face area for the type of sign proposed (i.e., wall, ground)

MINIMUM STATIC HOLD TIME BETWEEN MESSAGE CHANGES

  • 1 minute

MAXIMUM BRIGHTNESS

  • 465 lumens per square foot during daytime hours
  • 70 lumens per square foot during dawn, dusk, and nighttime hours

 

Flag: 3 per lot

MAXIMUM FLAGPOLE HEIGHT

  • 40 feet above grade or 40 feet above the highest point of a building if building-mounted

MAXIMUM NUMBER OF FLAGS PER FLAG POLE

  • 2

MAXIMUM SIZE PER FLAG

  • 60 square feet

MINIMUM SETBACK FROM ANY LOT LINE FOR A FLAGPOLE OR OTHER MOUNTING DEVICE

  • The height of the flagpole or mounting device if building-mounted

 

Ground Signs: 1 per lot

MAXIMUM HEIGHT

  • 6 feet for lots in residential districts; 15 feet for lots in all other districts [3] [4]

MAXIMUM SIGN FACE AREA

  • Lots in CON, PUB, and residential districts 32 sf per sign Lots in OFI, NCM 32 sf per sign Lots in DTNC, CZD, MXD CZM 48 sf per sign Lots in CRM, CZC, LID, HID, CZI 150 sf per sign

MINIMUM SETBACK FROM ANY LOT LINE

  • 5 feet

MIN. SEPARATION BETWEEN GROUND SIGNS ON SAME LOT

  • At least 250 feet apart at the closest point

MIN. SEPARATION BETWEEN GROUND SIGNS ON ADJACENT LOTS

  • 50 feet

 

Incidental Signs: 1 per principal + 1 per

MAXIMUM NUMBER OF INCIDENTAL SIGNS PER LOT

  • Lots with an existing single family detached dwelling or manufactured home 1 per principal + 1 per secondary building Lots with a single family attached, duplex, triplex, or quadplex dwelling unit 1 per dwelling unit Multi family dwelling 1 per building + 5 Lots in a mixed-use or non-residential district

MAXIMUM HEIGHT

  • 6 feet for lots in residential districts; 12 feet for lots in mixed-use and non-residential districts

MAXIMUM SIGN FACE AREA

  • 1½ square feet per sign

TOTAL INCIDENTAL SIGN FACE AREA PER MIXED-USE OR NONRESIDENTIAL LOT OR DEVELOPMENT

  • 36 square feet

MINIMUM SETBACK FROM ANY LOT LINE

  • 5 feet

 

Projecting Signs

MAXIMUM NUMBER OF PROJECTING SIGNS PER LOT

  • One per building façade

MAXIMUM HEIGHT

  • A projecting sign shall not project above the height of the wall it is mounted to

MAXIMUM SIGN FACE AREA

  • 40 square feet

MINIMUM SETBACK FROM ANY LOT LINE

  • A projecting sign shall not encroach into a required yard by more than 6 feet

 

Sidewalk Sign

MAXIMUM NUMBER OF SIDEWALK SIGNS PER LOT

  • 1 per street frontage, regardless of the number of tenants

MINIMUM CLEARANCE AROUND SIDEWALK SIGN

  • 5 feet

MAXIMUM HEIGHT

  • 4 feet

MAXIMUM SIGN FACE AREA

  • 8.5 square feet

MAXIMUM NUMBER OF SIDEWALK SIGN SIDES

  • 2

MAXIMUM DISTANCE FROM PRIMARY ENTRANCE OF USE BEING ADVERTISED

  • 25 linear feet

 

Subdivision Signs

MAXIMUM NUMBER OF SUBDIVISION SIGNS PER DEVELOPMENT

  • 1 per development entrance

MAXIMUM HEIGHT

  • 6 feet

MAXIMUM SIGN FACE AREA

  • 32 square feet

MINIMUM SETBACK FROM ANY LOT LINE

  • None

MINIMUM SETBACK FROM RIGHT-OF-WAY

  • 5 feet

 

Suspending Signs

MAXIMUM NUMBER OF PROJECTION SIGNS PER DEVELOPMENT

  • 1 per lot or 1 per tenant in a multi-tenant building

MAXIMUM MOUNTING HEIGHT

  • Below the roof or parapet

MAXIMUM SIGN FACE AREA

  • 3 square feet; 6 square feet in the DTNC district

MINIMUM SETBACK FROM ANY LOT LINE

  • Two feet of horizontal distance from the back of the curb

 

Wall Signs: 

  • DISTRICT TYPE OF TENANCY TYPE OF FAÇADE [1] MAX. # OF SIGNS TOTAL SIGN AREA/FAÇADE [2] CON, PUB, RESIDENTIAL, CZR All Primary [3] 1 16 square feet OFI, NCM
  • Single-tenant Primary [3] 1 32 square feet
  • Multi-tenant Primary [3] 1/tenant

ALL OTHERS

  • Single-tenant [4] Primary 2 Lesser of: 1.5 sf/linear foot of building façade or 200 sf
  • Single-tenant [4] Secondary 1 Lesser of: 1 sf/linear foot of building façade or 100 sf
  • Multi-tenant Primary 1/tenant Lesser of: 1.5 sf/linear foot of building façade or 200 sf
  • Multi-tenant Secondary 1/tenant [5] Lesser of: 1 sf/linear foot of building façade or 100 sf
  • Large format retail Primary 4 Lesser of: 1.5 sf/linear foot of building façade or 200 sf
  • Large format retail Secondary 2 Lesser of: 1 sf/linear foot of building façade or 100 sf

MAXIMUM MOUNTING HEIGHT

  • No wall sign shall extend above, below, or beyond the building wall to which it is attached

MAXIMUM DISTANCE FROM A BUILDING CORNER OR MULTI-TENANT BOUNDARY

  • Wall signs shall be no less than 18 inches from the outside corner of a building wall or from the boundary of a tenant’s wall frontage on a multi-tenant building

MINIMUM SETBACK FROM ANY LOT LINE

  • Same as the building

 

Window Signs: 

MAXIMUM NUMBER OF WINDOW SIGNS PER DEVELOPMENT

  • No limit, subject to the maximum sign face area standards

MAXIMUM MOUNTING HEIGHT

  • Window signs are not permitted above the second story or higher than 25 feet above ground level

MAXIMUM SIGN FACE AREA

  • DTNC District 25% of the outer extent of any single window or door
  • All Other Districts 33% of the outer extent of any single window or door

fields.fieldText: For more information regarding sign number limits and requirements click here and then select the Sign Permit Application.
